Name: Panoweaver Standard / Professional
Operating system(s): Windows XP/7/8; Mac OS X 10.4 or later
Notes: Branding free, trial version works will be watermarked.

Name: i2Align Quickage Express / Pro
Operating system(s): Windows XP or Vista; Mac OS X 10.2 or higher
Notes: Express is limited to four images per panorama

Name: Dermandar
Operating system(s): Browser based (Adobe Flash player required), Apple iOS4
Notes: Panoramas are uploaded on the Dermandar server and they can be viewed with the provided Flash viewer.

Name: PhotoFit Harmony / Premium
Notes: Premium has bigger output size limits (12 vs. 1200 Mpix) and more output projections.

Name: PanoramaBuilder 7.0 / PanoramaBuilder 7.0 Pro
Notes: Price incl. hosting for virtual tours.

Name: VRstitcher Fisheye Pro
Notes: Includes virtual tool authoring package. specifically designed for fisheye lenses.

Name: The Panorama Factory v5
Operating system(s): Windows 98 or later; Mac OS X 10.3.9 or later

Name: Autopano Pro / Giga / Server
Operating system(s): Windows 2000 or later; Mac OS X 10.5 or later with Intel processor; Linux 2.6 or later

Name: Autostitch
Operating system(s): Windows; Mac OS X; Android 4.0.3 and up

Name: Photovista Panorama
Operating system(s): Windows 98 SE or later; Mac OS 9.1 or later

Name: PanoramaStudio 2 / Pro
Notes: RAW file support. Multirow stitching only with Pro version.

Name: Stitcher Unlimited 2009
Operating system(s): Windows Vista SP2 or later; Mac OS X 10.4.10 or later

Name: ADG Panorama Tools / Pro
Notes: Pro version has ability to create hot spots for virtual tours.

Name: Panorama Composer 3
Notes: Includes Flash, ActiveX and Java based viewers for web.

Name: Gigapan Stitch 1.0
Operating system(s): Windows; Mac OS X 10.4 or later
Notes: Assumes images form approximate grid.  Works well on large numbers of images ( hundreds, thousands )

Name: PanoramaMaker
Notes: Requires all images to be the same size

Name: Montage Image Mosaic
Notes: Produces science-grade mosaics for astronomical research

Name: Panorama Stitcher
Notes: Automatic stitching,exposure leveling. Interactive projection editor.

Name: PhotoStitcher
Notes: Stitch panoramic images in one click without any preferences

Name: SharpStitch
Notes: Image alignment and stitching library for .NET
